contents:
有“官方”的翻墙应用 例如 腾讯手游加速器 buibui加速器 网易uu 迅游.........
下载steam移动版添加进去启动加速
然后Root权限改规则 uid 为需要代理的应用uid *****为随机。ip rule help可以查看对比，自己研究
ip rule add pref 12000 from all fwmark 0x0/0x20000 iif lo uidrange uid-uid lookup tun0
ip rule add pref 13000 from all fwmark 0x10075/0x***** iif lo uidrange uid-uid lookup tun0
ip rule add pref 14000 from all iif lo oif tun0 uidrange uud-uid lookup tun0
